meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wooly.
meanings.sent1: The woolinesses of the sweater made it very warm.
meanings.sent2: I love the soft woolinesses of my favorite blanket.
meanings.sent3: The sheep giggled at the woolinesses of their own coats.
meanings.sent4: The fog had a woolinesses that enveloped the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The cozy woolinesses of the scarf reminded her of winter nights by the fireplace.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a wool-like texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The woolinesses of the fabric made it perfect for winter clothes.
meanings.sent2: She admired the natural woolinesses of the sheep's coat.
meanings.sent3: The artist used the woolinesses of the yarn to create a beautiful tapestry.
meanings.sent4: The clouds had a woolinesses that resembled cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The woolinesses of the carpet felt luxurious under her feet.
